sentences.cn: 樟脑在酒精中可以溶化.

sentences.en: Carotenes are insoluble in water and soluble in oils and fats.
sentences.cn: 胡萝卜素不溶于水，但可溶于油类和脂肪。

sentences.en: Double cream contains approximately twice the quantity of fat-soluble vitamins as single cream.
sentences.cn: 高脂厚奶油中脂溶性维生素的含量大约是稀奶油的两倍。

sentences.en: Liquid water can leach soluble materials from the interface.
sentences.cn: 液态水能够从界面溶解出可溶性物质.

sentences.en: The disulphate was easily soluble in water.
The immunogenic potency of soluble antigens may be considerably increased.
sentences.cn: 它们的免疫原效能可以提高很多.

sentences.en: The organic acids produced in the upper horizons are soluble and mobile.
sentences.cn: 在土壤上层所产生的有机酸是水溶性的、流动性的.

sentences.en: The overwhelming majority of nonlinear differential equations are not soluble analytically.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数非线性微分方程是不能用解析方法求解的.

sentences.en: The red dye on the leather is water-soluble.
sentences.cn: 皮革上的这种红色染料可溶于水。

sentences.en: The schroedinger equation for the one - electron atom is exactly soluble.
sentences.cn: 单电子原子的薛定谔方程是可精确求解的.

sentences.en: Their amino acid composition resembles that of all the other'soluble " proteins.
sentences.cn: 它们的氨基酸组成与所有其它 可溶性 蛋白质相似.

sentences.en: These tablets are soluble in water.
sentences.cn: 这些药片可在水中溶解.

sentences.en: Uranium is soluble in sea water.

words.tran_cn: 可以解决的；可以解的；可溶的
解决方案；溶液；溶解；解答
[数] 可解性；解决之可能性；溶解度
[化学] 溶解；[化学] 溶剂化作用；溶化
[化学]可溶的，可溶解的；可解决的

phrases.tran_cn: n. [材料学]溶性玻璃（等于sodium silicate）

trans.tran_cn: [化] 可溶的，可以解决的，可以解释的，[数]可解的
trans.tran_en: a soluble substance can be  dissolved  in a liquid
